info.short_description: Framapiaf is Framasoft's Mastodon instance. Framasoft is a popular and educational network promoting free software.
info.full_description:
Issu du monde Ã©ducatif et dÃ©sormais tournÃ©e vers l'Ã©ducation populaire, Framasoft est avant tout un rÃ©seau de projets, dont le premier, l'annuaire Framalibre, remonte Ã  2001.

Ces projets sont animÃ©s par des personnes collaborant autour d'une mÃªme volontÃ© : promouvoir les libertÃ©s numÃ©riques.

Le respect des libertÃ©s fondamentales des utilisatrices et utilisateurs, garanties par des contrats lÃ©gaux (les licences libres), est au cÅ“ur du mouvement libriste et permet de s'assurer que l'humain reste en maÃ®trise de l'outil numÃ©rique.

Le but de Framasoft est de proposer, principalement en ligne, un ensemble d'outils concrets et pratiques visant Ã  faciliter l'adoption :

    de logiciels libres (annuaire, clÃ©s USB, installateurâ€¦) ;
    de crÃ©ations culturelles libres (blog, traduction, maison d'Ã©ditionâ€¦) ;
    de services libres (plus de 30 dans le projet DÃ©googlisons Internet).

PrÃ©sentÃ© comme une Â« porte d'entrÃ©e dans le monde du Libre Â», le rÃ©seau Framasoft souhaite se positionner comme un trait d'union entre la communautÃ© des libristes et le grand public.

info.short_description: chaos.social - because anarchy is much more fun with friends. For and by the chaos community.
info.full_description:
chaos.social - because anarchy is much more fun with friends.
chaos.social is a small Mastodon instance for and by the chaos community. We provide a small community space - be excellent to each other (and read the rules if you're not sure what that means).

Since "Be excellent to each other" is much easier said than done, we have a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviours on our about page that may lead to deletion of toots, and silencing or suspension of accounts, if problems persist.

Mastodon.art â€” a place for your artwork of all types from visual, musical, peformance or ____. Also, fun banter, commentary & cited fair-use posts/art/reviews of others' art too. Replace your twitter, tumblr & Facebook! Welcome to y(our) free & open source decentralized life. Mastodon.art doesn't monetize or profit off of your personal informationâ€”your information is never for sale. Export & leave for another instance anytime. No Brand, name or famous trademark squatting. Zero tolerance for harrassment or bullying â€” your account will be deleted. No Porn, No Loli, Artistic Form, No Bots & Respect Others

info.short_description: A social space for anyone in data, visualization, creative coding, and related arts and research.
info.full_description:
A social space for anyone in data, visualization, creative coding, and related arts and research. Share your work, discuss, critique, and ask for help! Come one, come all:

â†’ creative coders
â†’ data scientists and visualizers
â†’ generative artists
â†’ visual researchers, curators, and critics
â†’ anyone else data- or visualization-adjacent

If you are curious about the world and creativity, you are welcome here.

info.full_description: The Vulpine Club is a community for foxes and their associates, friends, fans, and other furry (and non-furry) creatures. We're pretty friendly and welcoming. =^^=

info.short_description: Plural CafÃ© is a community for plural systems and plural-friendly singlets alike.
info.full_description: Welcome to the Plural CafÃ©! Grab a hot cocoa or coffee from the bar, kick back and relax. This is a Mastodon instance that is focused around fostering a friendly and welcoming community for plural systems and plural-friendly singlets alike. The primary goal is to provide a sense of support and community around plural systems.

info.short_description: A place for your photos and banter. Photog first is our motto
info.full_description: A community of photographers, photo curious and more. A place where photography is the focus of the Local Timeline and socializing comes first.

info.short_description: Maly is a stable, non-tracking Mastodon instance running along other services like our PeerTube instance and a private cloud.
info.full_description:
Hello ! My name is Tijl Van den Brugghen, named KindlyFire online. I run this Mastodon instance and some other public services for anybody to enjoy. I detailed most information on this page, but feel free to ask me anything !

# Guarantees

* We do not track you. (but others on the Fediverse might, no instance can guarantee this)
* Light moderation. The instance rules are defined below.
* We federate with every instance out there. But that does not say we allow every kind of content.

# Rules

Obviously, every instance has to have rules. Without this, although this instance is pretty small, there would be problems. Here they are:

* Respect everyone
* Do not spam (this applies mainly to bots)
* No NSFW without an appropriete Content-Warning.
* Any kind of illigal content is prohibited.
* Have fun ğŸ‰

More information is available on our about page: https://maly.io/about/more

info.short_description: An instance for open source developers, free culture community and dreamers.
info.full_description:
Nasqueron is a budding community of creative people, writers, developers and thinkers. We focus on free culture, ethics and to be a positive change. We share values like respect, justice and equity.

You'll find here like-minded people to connect to, hang out, and build projects.

We focus on free culture, ethics and to be a positive change. When we develop a project, our software is open source our datasources and content are licensed under CC-BY-SA or CC-BY license. We share values like respect, justice and equity.

We like experiments, originality and to discover new things.

We are Nasqueron.

info.short_description: Art Alley is a Mastodon server for artists and commissioners
info.full_description:
Art Alley is a Mastodon server for artists and commissioners. Share your finished pieces, works in progress, changes to your commissions status and your livestreams.

Many platforms shun adult content. This place celebrates it. This server is hosted by an artist community: No matter which Sillicon Valley startups come and go, this place can remain as long as the community remains.

info.short_description: Dedicada principalmente a los temas relacionados con la polÃ­tica, la ciencia y la cultura. Es un espacio abierto al diÃ¡logo constructivo y respetuoso.
info.full_description:
PolÃ­tica ConCiencia pone a tu disposiciÃ³n un espacio dedicado al intercambio de ideas mediante un diÃ¡logo respetuoso y constructivo entre los individuos. En lo esencial, los temas que nos ocupan pertenecen al Ã¡mbito de la polÃ­tica, la ciencia y la cultura. AquÃ­, hallarÃ¡s un entorno apropiado para expresarte sin temor a ser censurado por tu postura ideolÃ³gica, tus convicciones o tus creencias.

    Para favorecer un medio armonioso, nuestra instancia se apega a un cÃ³digo de conducta, el cual debes revisar con detenimiento antes de registrarte (ademÃ¡s de los TÃ©rminos del servicio). No obstante, a manera de anticipo, debes saber que busca garantizar la libre expresiÃ³n en el marco del respeto al derecho de los seres humanos a salvaguardar su dignidad e integridad psicolÃ³gica y emocional.

    AsÃ­ pues, si estÃ¡s de acuerdo en que las conductas ofensivas que abundan en la mayorÃ­a de las redes sociales (insultos, ira, difamaciones, humillaciones o prÃ¡cticas similares), son un obstÃ¡culo para el establecimiento de relaciones sanas entre los miembros de una comunidad, sin duda alguna, este sitio es para ti.

    Al ingresar a esta comunidad, podrÃ¡s entablar contacto con cualquier persona que pertenezca a cualquier otra instancia de la red social Mastodon, lo cual amplÃ­a tus posibilidades de comunicaciÃ³n enormemente.

    Finalmente, considera que esta instancia no lucra con tu informaciÃ³n personal, de modo que para subsistir requiere de tu participaciÃ³n. Si estÃ¡ en tus posibilidades, no dudes en donar. Con ello, estarÃ¡s contribuyendo a la diversificaciÃ³n de los medios alternativos que fomentan la libertad de expresiÃ³n y aumentarÃ¡s las probabilidades de que este servidor, el cual serÃ¡ tu hogar en la federaciÃ³n de servidores de Mastodon, siga existiendo en el futuro.
info.topic: PolÃ­tica, ciencia, cultura y otros temas de interÃ©s general

info.short_description: We are an instance that tries its best to be as welcoming and friendly as possible! Here you can find all kinds of discussion, whether it is anime, te
info.full_description:
Our instance is a place for you to relax and chat. We want you to enjoy yourself and meet new people that you can connect with. We concentrate on making our instance special for what it is -
Open.

This is because we strive to make our instance open to everyone and hope that everyone can connect and meet new people to chat with. Whether you post cute anime pictures, discuss politics, hobbies, or what you did yesterday!

Have fun and please do not post content that breaks international law. Actually, we highly suggest that you do not break the international law.

info.short_description: A place for creative folks to interact without all the noise.
info.full_description:
Social @ Play Vicious is the social media component of the forth coming fourth version (ha) of Play Vicious. While Play Vicious itself will be a platform for content and consumables, interaction with said content will be handled by Social. Think of it as a federated media site that will work in cohesion with it's own social media installation.

I know. I think it's pretty cool too.

info.short_description: Mastodon for amateur game makers, and people interested in playing and thinking about amateur games.
info.full_description:
Hi! I hope Game Making Social is a cosey, friendly place to talk and share stuff about amateur videogame making and everything surrounding that. It's kinda an offshoot of Game Making Tools, which is a wiki(+) for a similar audience.

Game makers, game writers, game players most welcome! Unless you're a jerk!!

Please read the rules before signing-up :)

info.short_description: Mastodon instance hosted in Vietnam
info.full_description:
Weâ€™ve set up a Commie Twitter clone for those at risk of suspension / shadowbans etc

We host it, we secure it, we manage it, we moderate it. No tracking, no selling your data, no giving it to spooks, no ads in the TL, you wonâ€™t get suspended for calling Bob Geldof rude names.

Itâ€™s free for all now, it will remain free for customers, donors, moderators etc

Standard house rules :

No Nazis

No Nonces

No Regime Changers

Instant ban for all these 3 categories.

The rest of the rules will evolve over time

Use long passwords

Turn 2FA on

Sign up and then stick your cheeky red address in the bio of your twitter account so folk know where to find you if you get hit by their banhammer.

There are loads of apps to use. see here.

https://github.com/tootsuite/documentation/blob/master/Using-Mastodon/Apps.md

It may still be a bit Beta around the edges so any bugs please report.

Start your engines Comrades.

info.short_description: We host the tabletop community: casual gamers, hobbists, LARPers, game designers & publishers, artists, writer, vlogers, podcasters, reviewers, etc.
info.full_description:
We are here to host the tabletop community as a whole. We welcome everyone that wants to be part of the community, casual gamers, hobbists, mini painters, LARPers, designers, publishers, distributor, RPG caracters, artists, writers, vlogers, podcasters, reviewers, actual game and more.

This is meant to be a positive and safe space for people to enjoy each other's ideas, opinion and have fun. To keep tabletop.social that way, the Code of Conduct, Rules and Etiquette will be applied and enforced thoroughly.

info.short_description: This instance is primary about programming, EBM/Industrial music and videogames. But feel free to talk about whatever you want.
info.full_description:
Terms of use
Be polite to the others
Use NSFW for offending stuff
Don't write things that are against the laws of Czech republic

info.short_description: Yiff.Rocks is a stable, non-tracking Mastodon instance operated by furries, for furries. (friends are always welcome!)
info.full_description:
TL;DR
We follow a mostly laissez faire approach to the server, with only a few caveats.
We do not track you, Nor do we want to. (but others on the Fediverse might, no instance can guarantee this)
We are operated as a hobby first and foremost. Donations are cool but running a VPS is super affordable.
Light moderation. The instance rules are defined below.
We federate with everyone, but we don't cater to those who can't accept our already lenient standards.
Rules
Only the usual to keep things viable.
Be civil.
Don't spam. (applies mostly to bots.)
Use NSFW content warnings when needed!
US Law applies, don't do anything illegal here.
Must be at least 13 years of age (See COPPA Law in ToS). You will be banned.

info.short_description: A furry vore instance themed around a coffee shop.
info.full_description:
Welcome to Cafe Gulp! We are an adult oriented website themed around vore and endospmaphila. This can take many forms but are often very sensual and adult in nature. While we may be literal people eaters, we welcome all who can respect boundaries and each other. We will absolutely ban you for hate speech, trolling, or other disruptive mischief.
We currently federate with the rest of the mastodon federated universe and allow cross posting to and from Twitter through third-party services.

info.short_description: Mugwort operates as a social hub for witches, wiccans, and weird folk of all sorts.
info.full_description:
Mugwort operates as a social hub for witches, wiccans, and weird folk of all sorts. There is a focus on nature-based and folk-magic discussions, but our door is open to all types.

Be chill.

info.short_description: A general instance with a solarpunk theme. Anarchist and green.
info.full_description:
A friendly, diverse instance that focuses on creating a better future. Topics include Anarchism, Anticapitalism, technology, ecology, social justice, and much more - or anything you like!

We aim to provide a positive, inclusive space for people from different backgrounds and opinions that want to make the world a better place, one smell step at a time. Or just hang out with other cool people.

We are inspired by the solarpunk genre of art and literature.
